36
(1) Testamentary dispositions shall be reduced in equal proportions, irrespective of their nature and extent and irrespective of whether they are included in one or more wills, unless otherwise determined by a will.
(2) If a testator leaves more than one legacy and orders that a particular legacy is to be paid out before the others, this legacy shall be reduced only in those cases where the value of the other legacies is insufficient to cover the statutory portion.
